participant_1.background:
I just got a new iPhone, but I'm dreading having to pay my monthly bill.
I am a bit of a klutz, but my dog, Snowball, helps me keep my balance.
I am a software engineer who prides myself on finding the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular.
i hate carrots.
i live in chicago.

participant_2.background:
I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby.
i am a soccer mom.
i love art.
I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.
My adoptive parents were amazed when I played twinkle twinkle little star with my armpit.

content.text: Hey there! My name's Chris. What's your name?
Hi Chris, I'm Katie. Nice to meet you.
You too Katie. It's nice to meet you as well. I'm a software engineer. What do you do for a living?
I'm a soccer mom. I have a one year old daughter.
Oh that's awesome! I don't have kids yet, but I'm looking forward to it one day.
It's really fun. But it's also a lot of work!
I'm sure it is. Do you like running?
Yes I do! I like to run to stay healthy for my baby.
That's great. I just got a new iPhone, but I'm dreading having to pay my monthly bill.
Oh no! That's not fun. I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.
That's awesome. I love to travel. I've been to a lot of different countries.
Wow! That's really cool. I've only been to a few countries.
Well, I'm sure you'll get to travel to a lot more places in the future.
Thanks Chris. I'm sure I will
